text: John Entwistle (1932-2013), was a male cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England in the 1 Km time trial at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==Personal life== He was a telephone engineer and council leader. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2013 deaths Category:English male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: John Entwistle (cyclist)
